verses.roman:
jhālira upara 'munsiba' makaradhvaja-kara
prāṇa-rūpe jhāli rākhe hañā tatpara

synonyms: jhālira upara—upon the bags; munsiba—the superintendent; makaradhvaja-kara—Makaradhvaja Kara; prāṇa-rūpe—like his life; jhāli rākhe—he keeps the bags; hañā tatpara—with great attention.
translation: The superintendent for all those bags was Makaradhvaja Kara, who kept them with great attention like his very life.
